InterestMeasureThreshold.Extension: a >= BASE ... at least BASE-number of objects for dependency to be statistically relevant
a/(a+b) >= p ... at least 100*p [%] of objects satisfying A satisfy also S

AssociationRule.Text: Age(<21;31)) & Sex(F) ::: Quality(bad) / Amount(<250;500)) & Duration(4 years)
Age(<21;31)) & Sex(F) & Salary(low) ::: Quality(bad) / Duration(4 years)
